column5: Can someone tell me what the price of a Non-Resident fishing license is this season(in US dollars) Thanks

The following are the license Canada US Year Sport = $64.00 $56.38 Year Conservation = $39.00 $34.36 7-day sport = $41.00 $36.12 7-day conservation = $24.00 $21.14 These are based on the current exchange rate.

True/False? An "Eight-day Sport Fishing Licence" is available for 2006. It appears so according their webpage. Who can confirm this and relay the USD on such a license?http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/fishing/ocnonresopt.html An Eight-day sure would work in my favor this year! Thanks

The 8 day license will replace the 7 day license. This is a great idea and aimed at those that stay a full 7 nights and like to fish the morning they leave for home. In past years, if you arrived on a Saturday and bought a 7 day license, you would not be legal to fish that following saturday morning before you leave. Kudos to the MNR for listening to outfitters and guests and implementing the change.
